nodes.text: The Dragon Queen was Queen Mother Tenel Ka's personal Hapan Battle Dragon.

It served as her flagship during the Second Galactic Civil War, in the battles of Hapes and Kashyyyk. It also appeared during the battle over Shedu Maad, where a nanovirus was released on it to kill all of those with Hapan Royal Blood. Though the assassination attempt resulted in the deaths of many of Dragon Queen's crew members, it failed to kill the Queen Mother or her daughter—the primary targets—thanks to a doomed Darth Caedus warning them through the Force at the last minute.
